mapper.select: select o.order_num, o.order_date, o.order_price, g.goods_num, g.goods_name, g.goods_image, g.goods_price, od.order_detail_amount, od.order_detail_weight, ga.goods_weight, ao.aorder_state, o.mem_num from admin_order ao, orders o, orders_detail od, goods g, goods_attribute ga where o.mem_num = #{MEM_NUM} and ao.aorder_order_num = o.order_num and od.order_num = o.order_num and od.goods_num = g.goods_num and ga.goods_num = g.goods_num order by o.order_date desc

SELECT O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_NUM, O.ORDER_DZIPCODE, O.ORDER_DADD1, O.ORDER_DADD2, O.ORDER_DMEMO, O.ORDER_TCOST, O.ORDER_PAY_NAME, O.ORDER_PAY_RBANK, O.ORDER_PAY_RACCOUNT, M.MEM_NAME, M.MEM_PHONE FROM ORDERS O , MEMBER M WHERE O.ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND O.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN aorder_state = '0' THEN 1 END) as PAT_NOT_YET, COUNT(CASE WHEN aorder_state = '1' THEN 1 END) as READY_DELIVERY, COUNT(CASE WHEN aorder_state = '2' THEN 1 END) as DELIVERING, COUNT(CASE WHEN aorder_state = '3' THEN 1 END) as SCDELIVERY, COUNT(CASE WHEN aorder_state = '4' OR aorder_state = '5' THEN 1 END) as CXL, COUNT(CASE WHEN aorder_state = '6' OR aorder_state = '7' OR aorder_state = '8' THEN 1 END) as EXCHANGE, COUNT(CASE WHEN aorder_state = '9' OR aorder_state = '10' THEN 1 END) as REFUND, COUNT(CASE WHEN aorder_state = '4' OR aorder_state = '5' OR aorder_state = '6' OR aorder_state = '7' OR aorder_state = '8' OR aorder_state = '9' OR aorder_state = '10' THEN 1 END) as SHIT FROM admin_order where mem_num = #{MEM_NUM}

SELECT O.ORDER_NUM, O.ORDER_DATE, M.MEM_NAME, M.MEM_PHONE, O.ORDER_DZIPCODE, O.ORDER_DADD1, O.ORDER_DADD2, O.ORDER_DMEMO, O.ORDER_TCOST, O.ORDER_PAY_NAME, O.ORDER_PAY_RBANK, O.ORDER_PAY_RACCOUNT, D.ORDER_DETAIL_AMOUNT, GA.GOODS_WEIGHT, D.GOODS_NUM, A.AORDER_STATE, A.AORDER_TRACKING, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_IMAGE FROM ORDERS O, ORDERS_DETAIL D, ADMIN_ORDER A, GOODS G, MEMBER M, GOODS_ATTRIBUTE GA WHERE O.MEM_NUM = #{MEM_NUM} AND O.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM AND O.ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND A.AORDER_ORDER_NUM = O.ORDER_NUM AND D.ORDER_NUM = O.ORDER_NUM AND G.GOODS_NUM = D.GOODS_NUM AND G.GOODS_NUM = GA.GOODS_NUM AND G.GOODS_NAME = #{GOODS_NAME}

select DISTINCT od.ORDER_NUM, od.GOODS_NUM, od.ORDER_DETAIL_AMOUNT, od.ORDER_DETAIL_WEIGHT, g.GOODS_NAME, ao.AORDER_STATE from ORDERS_DETAIL od, ORDERS o, goods g, admin_order ao where od.ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND o.MEM_NUM = #{MEM_NUM} AND od.GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM} AND g.goods_num = od.GOODS_NUM AND ao.AORDER_ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND ao.AORDER_ORDER_NUM = od.ORDER_NUM AND od.ORDER_DETAIL_WEIGHT = #{ORDER_DETAIL_WEIGHT}
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMIN_ORDER SET AORDER_STATE = #{AORDER_STATE}, ORDER_REPORT_COMMENT = #{ORDER_REPORT_COMMENT}, AS_SDATE = SYSDATE WHERE AORDER_ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}
